review: Nice movie experience for what I have seen so far.  The Prime hype (as the intro movie said) about accessing 40,000 titles as part of the Prime membership is overstated.  This machine will only list 100 titles and after going through them, there are no other choices.  Were are these 40k titles?  There should be a web page that lists all Prime movies/TV shows.  This was the main reason I got this device.  The Amazon video on my Vizio only showed about 15 movies. For both my TV and the Fire, it was up to me to hunt around for movies that are "free" to me with my prime membership.Here is another big one.  I was surprised to see pics from my computer displayed on the Fire.  I thought I had more security on my machine but apparently Amazon has a way to gain access to my computer without a login and extract information from my machine.  Disturbing?  Yes.Overall, I have some alternative to Apple.  I like this appliance and plan to see how it works overall in my Apple environment.  I would give five stars if the hype about movie access was implemented.  This may be another instance of sales hype that didn't get any follow-through.  It is a nice product to have for the Amazon ecosystem of movies, shows and music.

Videos stutter all the time and would sometimes get stuck while the kindle hdx keeps on playing. Their much publicized "mayday" feature also doesn't help much. I was on the phone with 3 different "experts" or specialists, and boy, what a waste of time. I love my kindle hdx, but the fire tv is going back. Lastly, they need a whole bunch more apps so that you don't have to rely on the mirroring feature which really doesn't work
